description:
Luffy`s arrival in the New World is marked by violent weather and the discovery of a tiny stowaway. When the Straw Hats agree to help their new friend, it could lead to big trouble with the Marines!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: - Saga dell`ambizione di Z - La piccola gigante Lily
L’ambition de Z : Lily, la petite géante !
Z no Yabou Hen: Chiisana Kyojin Lily!
Z`s Ambition! Lily the Little Giant!
Zの野望編 小さな巨人リリー!
